subject: National Conference NCFDSTE 2019 (Publication Partners SCOPUS / ESCI / UGC Care Indexed Journals)
body:
National Conference on Future Dimensions in Science, Technology & Engineering (NCFDSTE-2019)

NCFDSTE 2019
Bikaner (Rajasthan) | 7 December, 2019
Organized by
Govt. Polytechnic College, Bikaner (Rajasthan)
& Auricle Global Society of Education and Research, Bikaner (Rajasthan)

Download Brochure: http://agser.org/ncfdste/NcfdsteBrochure.pdf

Dear Researchers,
We are inviting you to participate in the National Conference on Future Dimensions in Science, Technology & Engineering (NCFDSTE-2019) in Bikaner, Rajasthan on December 7, 2019.
You are invited to contribute your research papers in a forum for focused discussions on new topics or innovative applications of established approaches in various fields of Engineering.We truly believe that your participation will make this conference a great success.

All the Accepted and Presented Paper will be Published in SCOPUS / ESCI / UGC CARE Journals. Extended version of selected paper will be submitted for Inderscience / IGI-Global / Taylor & Francis Journals.

Scope and Topics

Track 01 : Electrical, Electronics, ENTC and Communication Engineering
Track 02 : Computer Science & Engineering / Information Technology
Track 03 : Mechanical Engineering
Track 04 : Civil Engineering/Architectural and Environmental Engineering
Track 05 : Power and Energy Engineering
Track 06 : Fundamental and Applied Science 
Track 07 : Management

Keynote Speakers

Dr. H.P. Vyas
Former Director, DRDO, New Delhi.

Important Dates

Paper Submission   : 7 November 2019
Notification of Paper  : 12 November 2019
Registration & CRC Submission  : 20 November 2019
Date of Conference  : 7 December 2019

Submission Instructions

Paper format: Standard IEEE Format.

Paper Length: 6-8 Pages Maximum

You can Submit your paper by mailing us to ncfdste@agser.org

Registration

Kindly Visit: http://agser.org/ncfdste/registration.php

Venue

Government Polytechnic College, Bikaner (Rajasthan)

Contact

For any additional query, please email and contact the conference organizers 
Contact: 

+91 9694206948 (Rahul Sharma, Seceratery, AGSER)

+91 8003781633 (Er. Prashant Joshi, Convener NCFDSTE)
Email: ncfdste@agser.org

Regards
Convener NCFDSTE 2019

http://agser.org/ncfdste/

*****Please reply it with subject “unsubscribe” if you wish to remove your email from our mailing list.
